### VERSION ###
DKSET(SDL2_VERSION SDL2-2.0.14)

DKSET(SDL2 ${3RDPARTY}/${SDL2_VERSION})
DKSET(SDL2_INCLUDE_DIR ${SDL2})
DKSET(SDL2_LIBRARY ${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib)
DKSET(SDL2_LIBRARY_TEMP ${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib)
DKSET(SDL2MAIN_LIBRARY ${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2main.lib)


### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(https://www.libsdl.org/release/${SDL2_VERSION}.zip SDL2 ${SDL2_VERSION})


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${SDL2}/include)
ANDROID_INCLUDE(${SDL2}/src)
##LINUX_INCLUDE(/opt/vc/lib) ##For Raspberry Pi
LINUX_INCLUDE(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/include)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/SDL2d.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/SDL2maind.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2main.lib)
MAC_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libSDL2.a)
MAC_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libSDL2.a)
IOSSIM_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/Xcode-iOS/SDL/build/Debug-iphonesimulator/libSDL2.a)
IOSSIM_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/Xcode-iOS/SDL/build/Release-iphonesimulator/libSDL2.a) 
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/libSDL2d.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/libSDL2.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libSDL2.so)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libSDL2.so)
RASPBERRY_DEBUG_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/libSDL2d.a)
RASPBERRY_RELEASE_LIB(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/libSDL2.a)
LIST(APPEND WIN_LIBS winmm.lib)
LIST(APPEND WIN_LIBS imm32.lib)
LIST(APPEND WIN_LIBS version.lib)
LIST(APPEND WIN_LIBS Setupapi.lib)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${SDL2}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A Win32 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__FLTUSED__" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSDL_SHARED=OFF -DVIDEO_OPENGLES=OFF -DLIBC=ON ${SDL2})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2-static)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2-static)
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2main)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2main)

DKSETPATH(${SDL2}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A x64 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__FLTUSED__" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSDL_SHARED=OFF -DVIDEO_OPENGLES=OFF -DDIRECTX=OFF -DLIBC=ON ${SDL2})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2-static)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2-static)
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2main)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(${SDL2_VERSION} SDL2.sln SDL2main)

IF(IOSSIM)
	EXECUTE_PROCESS(COMMAND xcodebuild -configuration Debug build -arch i386 -sdk iphonesimulator6.1 WORKING_DIRECTORY ${SDL2}/Xcode-iOS/SDL)
	EXECUTE_PROCESS(COMMAND xcodebuild -configuration Release build -arch i386 -sdk iphonesimulator6.1 WORKING_DIRECTORY ${SDL2}/Xcode-iOS/SDL)
ENDIF()


DKSETPATH(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug)
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DSDL_SHARED=OFF -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC -DDIRECTX=OFF -DVIDEO_WAYLAND=OFF ${SDL2})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make SDL2-static)

DKSETPATH(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release)
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -DSDL_SHARED=OFF -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC -DVIDEO_OPENGLES=OFF -DDIRECTX=OFF -DVIDEO_WAYLAND=OFF ${SDL2})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make SDL2-static)

ANDROID_NDK_DEBUG(${SDL2_VERSION})
ANDROID_NDK_RELEASE(${SDL2_VERSION})

DKSETPATH(${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug)
RASPBERRY_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DSDL_SHARED=OFF -DVIDEO_OPENGLES=ON -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC ${SDL2})
RASPBERRY_DEBUG_COMMAND(make SDL2-static)

DKSETPATH(${SDL2}/${OS}/Release)
RASPBERRY_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -DSDL_SHARED=OFF -DVIDEO_OPENGLES=ON -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC ${SDL2})
RASPBERRY_RELEASE_COMMAND(make SDL2-static)



### INJECT ###


DKSET(SDL2_WIN32
	-DSDL2_DIR=${SDL2}
	-DSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR=${SDL2}/include
	-DSDL2_LIBRARY_TEMP=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib
	-DSDL2_LIBRARY=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib
	-DSDL2_LIBRARY_DEBUG=${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/SDL2d.lib
	-DSDL2_LIBRARY_RELEASE=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib
	-DSDL2MAIN_LIBRARY_TEMP=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2main.lib
	-DSDL2MAIN_LIBRARY=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2main.lib
	-DSDL2MAIN_LIBRARY_DEBUG=${SDL2}/${OS}/Debug/SDL2maind.lib
	-DSDL2MAIN_LIBRARY_RELEASE=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2main.lib)
